Name: congenital chylothorax
Definition: A pleural disease characterized by the accumulation of chyle within the pleural space leading to respiratory distress

Name: pleurisy
Definition: A pleural disease that is characterized by inflammation of the pleura

Name: pleural tuberculosis
Definition: An extrapulmonary tuberculosis that results_in lymphocyte-predominant exudative pleural effusion

Name: pneumothorax
Definition: An embryonal cancer that are masses of rapidly growing cells that originates in embryonic (fetal) tissue in the brain and spinal cord.

Name: pleural empyema
Definition: A soft tissue infectious disease that involves accumulation of pus in the pleural cavity as a result of infection within the lung (pneumonia) or a lung abscess spreading into the space. The symptoms include cough

Name: obsolete feline panleukopenia
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in ulceration located_in intestinal epithelium of cats

Name: obsolete avian leukosis
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in infection in birds

Name: pulmonary blastoma
Definition: A lung cancer that has_material_basis_in tissues of the lung and has_material_basis_in pleural tissues. It is most commonly effects children.

Name: benign pleural mesothelioma
Definition: A viral infectious disease that results_in infection
